Banners

Main page banners

These banners are to be used when there is a system message or something that is affecting the page overall.

Example

This is some message information you need to use that affected in a way what you are doing in the page. Can be good or as Trump would say 'Too bad! Too bad!'.

close

This is some message information you need to use that affected in a way what you are doing in the page. Can be good or as Trump would say 'Too bad! Too bad!'.

close

close

Inline banners

  
These banners are to be used when you need to point at an specific line in the layout of the page. One use case for this could be a form highlighting an error in a groupd of input fields or dropdowns. In essence, you will use it not to point something work with the page based on an action you might have taken, but it'll be related with something specific going on in the UI.

  

    

      
Example

    

    

      

        

          

            
This is some message information you need to use that affected in a way what you are doing in the page. Can be good or as Trump would say 'Too bad! Too bad!'.

          

          

            close
          

        


        

          

            
This is some message information you need to use that affected in a way what you are doing in the page. Can be good or as Trump would say 'Too bad! Too bad!'.

          

          

            close

            close
          

        


        

          

            
This is some message information you need to use that affected in a way what you are doing in the page. Can be good or as Trump would say 'Too bad! Too bad!'.

          

          

            close
          

        


        

          

            
This is some message information you need to use that affected in a way what you are doing in the page. Can be good or as Trump would say 'Too bad! Too bad!'.

          

          

            close

Sticky banners

  
These are page level banners that will be shown to the user in case there are issues that would affect the page as a whole.

  
We can position these sticky banner on 4 positions:

  
    
    
  • top-left
    • 
    
  • top-right
    • 
    
  • bottom-left
    • 
    
  • bottom-right
    • 
  

  

    

      
Example

    

    

      

        

          

          

            
This is some message information you need to use that affected in a way what you are doing in the page. Can be good or as Trump would say 'Too bad! Too bad!'.

          

          

            close
          

        


        

          

          

            
This is some message information you need to use that affected in a way what you are doing in the page. Can be good or as Trump would say 'Too bad! Too bad!'.

          

          

            close
          

        


        

          

          

            
This is some message information you need to use that affected in a way what you are doing in the page. Can be good or as Trump would say 'Too bad! Too bad!'.

          

          

            close
          

        


        

          

          

            
This is some message information you need to use that affected in a way what you are doing in the page. Can be good or as Trump would say 'Too bad! Too bad!'.

          

          

            close
          

        


        

          

          

            
This is some message information you need to use that affected in a way what you are doing in the page. Can be good or as Trump would say 'Too bad! Too bad!'.

          

          

            close
